class NodeNotePackage.NodeNote.GraphicsView.view.View(mainwindow, parent=None, root_flag=True, proxy_widget=None)

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QGraphicsView, NodeNotePackage.NodeNote.Model.serializable.Serializable

Class used for managing components.

  • Delete and create components.

  • Zoom in and Zoom out.

  • Gpu acceleration.

  • ui settings.

  • cutline to delete pipes.

  • Serach widget.

  • Serialization and deserialization.

change_flowing_image()

  • Change the flowing image whose format is “PNG”.

  • the default image is the flower.

change_svg_image()

  • Change the background image whose format is “SVG”.

  • The default image is a girl.

cutline_released()

If cutline touched pipes, delete pipes.
